       </ul>
		<div class="clearboth"></div>

</div>




<script type="text/javascript"> 

$(document).click(function(e){
	$target = $(e.target);
	if ($target.is("#navBar li span")) 
	{
		//caching selectors
		var $parent = $target.parent(),
		$siblings = $parent.siblings(),
		$dropdowns_siblings = $siblings.find(".dropdown"),
		$dropdown_current = $parent.find(".dropdown"),
		$nav_container = $("#navContainer"),
		rowWidth = 0; //declare variable

		//hide other menus if visible
		$dropdowns_siblings.hide();
		$siblings.removeClass("currentOver").find("span").removeClass("subhoverActive");

		$target.next().toggle(); //toggles the dropdown on click
		$target.toggleClass("subhoverActive");
		$parent.toggleClass("currentOver");

		//Calculate width of ul	
		$parent.find("ul").each(function() {rowWidth += $(this).width(); });
		
		//Set width of .dropdown
		$dropdown_current.css({'width' : rowWidth});

		//flip dropdown direction if goes over navigation container
		if ( $nav_container.width() +  $nav_container.offset().left < $dropdown_current.offset().left + $dropdown_current.outerWidth())
			{ $dropdown_current.removeClass("leftAlign").addClass("rightAlign"); }
	}
	else if ($target.is("#navBar .currentOver") || $target.is("#navBar .dropdown"))
	{
		//if target is inside activated dropdown state (arrow excluded)
		//do nothing
	}
	else
	{
		var $dropdown_arrow = $("#navBar li span");
		$("#navBar .dropdown").hide();
		$("#navBar li").removeClass();
		if ( $dropdown_arrow.hasClass("subhoverActive") ) 
			{ $dropdown_arrow.removeClass("subhoverActive"); }
	}
	
});

</script>


	


</div>
<div class="clearboth"></div>


<!-- Sliding Billboard -->
<div id="Billboard" style="text-align:center;width:980px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;">

<!-- begin ad tag (tile=4) -->
<!-- Billboard ad spot -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
document.write('<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ad.doubleclick.net/adj/fcc.forum/inforum;kw=homepage;tile=2;sz=980x330;dcopt=ist;ord=' + ord + '?"><\/script>');
//]]>
</script>
<noscript><a href="http://ad.doubleclick.net/jump/fcc.forum/inforum;kw=homepage;tile=2;sz=980x330;dcopt=ist;ord=123456789?" target="_blank" ><img src="http://ad.doubleclick.net/ad/fcc.forum/inforum;kw=homepage;tile=2;sz=980x330;dcopt=ist;ord=123456789?" border="0" alt="" /></a></noscript>
<!-- end ad tag -->	
    
</div> 


<script>
  var RADAR_INITIALIZED = false;

	//<![CDATA[
	$(document).ready(function() {

	
		function showBreakingWeather(){
			$('#breakingWeather_closable').show();
			$('#breakingWeather_pencil').hide();
  	  if(!RADAR_INITIALIZED){
        initialize();
			}
		}

		$('#breakingWeather_close').click(function() {
        pauseRadar();
				$('#breakingWeather_closable').hide();
				$('#breakingWeather_pencil').show();
			});

		$('#breakingWeather_pencil').click(function(){
				showBreakingWeather();
			});

		$('#weatherAlertsForm').submit(function(){
			$("#alertFormError").html('');
			$('#mobile_number').val($('#mobile_number').val().replace(/[^0-9]/g,''));
			if($('#mobile_number').val().length != 10){
				$("#alertFormError").html('Please enter valid phone number');
			}else{
				if($('#state').val() == ''){
					$("#alertFormError").html('Please select a state');
				}else{
					if($('#county').val() == ''){
						$("#alertFormError").html('Please select a county');
					}else{
				
			
						formData = $('#weatherAlertsForm').serialize();
						$.post('?event=ajax.setMobileAlerts',formData,function(data){
							error = $(data).find('error').text();
							message = $(data).find('message').text();
							$("#alertFormError").html(message);
							return false;
						});
					}
				}
			}
			return false;
		});		
	});

	//]]>
</script>




<div class="clearboth"></div>

	</style>
<![endif]-->

<style>
/* container for slides */
#featureContent_v2 {
	position:relative;	
	width:630px; height:315px; /* required */
	margin: 30px 15px 15px 15px;
	cursor:pointer;
	background-color:#000000;
}

/* single slide */
#featureContent_v2 > div {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;left:0;	
	display:none;
}


#featureContent_v2 > div a.photo {width:630px; height: 315px; display:block; z-index:3;}
#featureContent_v2 .panel 
{
	z-index:5; 
	position:absolute; 
	bottom:0;
	overflow:hidden;
}

#featureContent_v2 .panel a {color:#fff;}

#featureContent_v2 .toggletab 
{
	background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.9);
	color:#fff; 
	width:90px; 
	padding:5px; 
	font-weight:bold;
	-moz-border-radius-topright: .5em; 
	-webkit-border-top-right-radius: .5em; 
}

#featureContent_v2 h3, #featureContent_v2 .informationMore
{
	background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.9);
	color:#FFF;
} 

#featureContent_v2 h3 {font: normal 25px serif; margin:0;padding:10px; width:610px;}
#featureContent_v2 .informationMore {display:none; overflow:auto;width:630px;}
#featureContent_v2 .informationMore p {padding:10px; margin:0; font-weight:bold; line-height:17px;}
#featureContent_v2 .informationMore ul {width:180px; font-size:11px; padding:10px; margin:0 0 0 10px; float:right; border-left:1px solid #fff; height:80px; letter-spacing:.05em;}
#featureContent_v2 .informationMore ul li {list-style-type:square; padding:0; margin:0 0 2px 15px;}
#featureContent_v2 .informationMore ul li:first-child {list-style-type:none; padding:0; margin:0 0 2px;}


.featureContentNav {float:right; margin:10px 10px 0 0;}

/* single tab */
.featureContentNav a {
	width:8px; height:8px;
	float:left;
	margin:3px;
	background:url(/global_site/template/gfx/navigator.png) 0 0 no-repeat;
	display:block;
	font-size:1px;		
}

/* mouseover state */
.featureContentNav a:hover {background-position:0 -8px;}

/* active state (current page state) */
.featureContentNav a.current {background-position:0 -16px;} 	

/* prev and next buttons */
#featureContent_v2 .forward, #featureContent_v2 .backward {
	background-image: url(/global_site/template/gfx/fc_arrows.png);
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	display:block;
	width:30px;
	height:30px;
	font-size:1px;
	text-indent:-9999em;
	position:absolute; 
	z-index:10; 
	top:40%; 
}

#featureContent_v2 .forward {right:5px; background-position:right;} /* next */
#featureContent_v2 .backward {left:5px; background-position:left;} /* prev */

</style>

<script type="text/javascript" src="/javascript/jquery.tools.min.js"></script>

<script language="JavaScript">
//<![CDATA[

	$("#featureContent_v2 .backward, #featureContent_v2 .forward").hide();
	
	$(".featureContentNav").tabs("#featureContent_v2 > div", {
		effect: 'fade',
		fadeOutSpeed: "slow",
		rotate: true
		}).slideshow({autoplay:true, interval: 7000, clickable: false});
		
	$("#featureContent_v2").hover(function() {
			$("#featureContent_v2 .backward, #featureContent_v2 .forward").show();
		}, function() {
			$("#featureContent_v2 .backward, #featureContent_v2 .forward").hide();
	});
	
	$(".toggletab").toggle(
		function() {
			var $this = $(this); 
			$this.next().hide();
			$this.siblings('.informationMore').show();
			$this.html('<img src="/global_site/template/gfx/uparrowchevron.png" alt="arrow" style="margin-right:3px;" /> show less');
			$(".featureContentNav").data("slideshow").stop();
		},
		function() {
			var $this = $(this);
			$this.next().show();
			$this.html('<img src="/global_site/template/gfx/downarrowchevron.png" alt="arrow" style="margin-right:3px;" /> show more');
			$this.siblings('.informationMore').hide();
			$(".featureContentNav").data("slideshow").play();
		});

//]]>
</script>

<div class="left">

<script type="text/javascript" src="/javascript/flowplayer_site_keys.js"></script>



	<div class="article_brief_box clearfix">
	<h2><a href="/event/article/id/413993/" title="Missing 16-year-old boy has been located">Missing 16-year-old boy has been located</a></h2>
	
		<a href="/event/image/id/358319/" class="photoborder_tb"><img src="/media/thumb/jpg/2013/10/02/aaron-arton-wellik.jpg" class="left" alt="Missing 16-year-old boy has been located"/></a>
	
	<p>FARGO â€“ A 16-year-old boy who walked away from a juvenile care facility here on Tuesday has been located, according to Fargo police. 
</p>

	
		<div class="clearboth"></div>
		<span class="grayfont"><strong>RELATED CONTENT</strong></span>
		<ul>
			
								<li class="photoimage"><a href="/event/image/id/358319/headline/Aaron Arton Wellik/" title="IMAGE">
								Aaron Arton Wellik </a></li>
						
		</ul>
	

	</div>


	<div class="article_brief_box clearfix">
	<h2><a href="/event/article/id/414011/" title="Students file suit against Globe University claiming they were misled">Students file suit against Globe University claiming they were misled</a></h2>
	
	<p>WOODBURY, Minn. - Five current and former Globe University students filed a lawsuit Wednesday against the for-profit school and its affiliated partner, Minnesota School of Business.
</p>

	

	</div>


	<div class="article_brief_box clearfix">
	<h2><a href="/event/article/id/413991/" title="Phone scam targeting elderly victims hits area">Phone scam targeting elderly victims hits area</a></h2>
	
	<p>FARGO â€“ The Cass County Sheriffâ€™s Office is alerting the public to a phone scam that may again be operating in the area.
</p>

	

	</div>

	<div class="article_brief_box clearfix">
	<h2><a href="/event/article/id/288/" title=""></a></h2>
	
	<p><p><a target="_blank" href="http://www.rrrdc.com/dispatch-logs/"><img border="0" alt="" width="300" height="50" src="http://www.inforum.com/dynamic/full/png/2009/10/08/crime_watch_bg_2.png" /></a></p></p>

	

	</div>


<script>
	$("a[rel='loadAudio']").click(function () {
		var videoVar = this.id;
		var videoArray = videoVar.split('*');
		var aID = videoArray[0]
		var aDomain = videoArray[1]
		var aFile = videoArray[2]
		var aCt = videoArray[3]

		$("div[id*='conAudio"+aCt+"']").html(""); //this needed for IE to stop other flowplayers from playing
		$("div[id*='conAudio"+aCt+"']").hide();
		$("div[id*='conAudio"+aCt+aID+"']").show();

		$f("conAudio"+aCt+aID, "/global_site/template/audio/flowplayer.commercial-3.1.4.swf", {
			playlist: [
				"http://legacy."+aDomain+"/audio/"+aFile,
				{
					url: "http://legacy."+aDomain+"/audio/"+aFile
				}
			],
			plugins: {
				content: {
					url: '/global_site/template/audio/flowplayer.controls-3.1.4.swf',
					backgroundImage: 'url(/global_site/template/gfx/audioPlayer.gif) repeat',
					backgroundColor:'#ffffff',
					fullscreen: false,
					top:0, right: 0, width: 200, height: 20
				},
				controls: {
					backgroundImage: 'url(/global_site/template/gfx/audioPlayer.gif) repeat',
					backgroundColor:'#ffffff',
					fullscreen: false,
					height: 20
					}
				},
				tooltips: {
					buttons: true,
					pause: 'Continue playing',
					volume: null
			}
		});
	});
</script>


</div> <div class="left">

<script type="text/javascript" src="/javascript/apNews.min.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
<div class="widget_box">
	
		<h2>AP Newswire</h2>
		<div class="apnews_header">
			
			<a id="ap_news_selector_world" class="world" title="World" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=world">World </a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_us" class="us" title="US" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=us">US</a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_sports" class="sports" title="Sports" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=sports">Sports</a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_tech" class="tech" title="Tech" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=tech">Tech</a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_entertainment" class="entertainment" title="Entertainment" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=entertainment">Entertainment</a>
			<br />
			<a id="ap_news_selector_politics" class="politics" title="Politics" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=politics">Politics</a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_business" class="business" title="Business" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=business">Business</a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_health" class="health" title="Health" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=health">Health</a> | 
			<a id="ap_news_selector_strange" class="strange" title="Strange" href="?event=ajax.ap_mod_xml&APWire=strange">Strange</a>
		</div>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			activateClick();
			setAPNewswire_active('US');
		</script>
		
		
		
					
			<div id="ap_selector_name"><h1><a href="/event/apContent/APWire/US/">US</a></h1></div>
			<div id="ap_content">
				
					<div class="photoborder_tb left"><img src="http://legacy.in-forum.com/ap/images/photos/small/Bus_Overturned.20131002145135.jpg" alt="Authorities: 8 killed in church bus crash in Tenn." class="noBorder" /></div>
							
				<h3><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA96BPFG0/" class="headline">Authorities: 8 killed in church bus crash in Tenn.</a></h3>
				
   
    
    
    
    
    
    A bus taking a church group home to North Carolina blew a tire, veered across a highway median and crashed into a sport utility vehicle and tracto...	  
			</div>
		
				
		<div id="ap_more_headlines" class="clearboth">
			<ul>
				
				<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA96C8L80/" class="headline">10 Things to Know for Thursday</a></div></li>
				
				<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA969GD80/" class="headline">Witness describes bomb scare at Fla. airport</a></div></li>
				
				<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA968FTO0/" class="headline">Marathon suspect wants prison restrictions lifted</a></div></li>
				
				<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA96BPFG0/" class="headline">8 killed in fiery church bus crash in Tennessee; bus crossed median, hit SUV, tractor-trailer</a></div></li>
			
			</ul>
		</div>
	<br />

			activateStateClick();

		<div id="sw_content">
			
			<div id="sw_selector_name">
				<h1><a href="/event/apContent/APWire/MN/" title="More Minnesota News">Minnesota News</a></h1>
			</div>
			
				
			<div id="ap_state_headlines">
				<ul>
				
					<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA96AR600/" class="headline" title="Iowa senator quits after report on Bachmann money">Iowa senator quits after report on Bachmann money</a></div></li>
				
					<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA96A9SO0/" class="headline" title="Synthetic drug case goes to the jury">Synthetic drug case goes to the jury</a></div></li>
				
					<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA9693M81/" class="headline" title="Government shutdown sets federal workers on edge">Government shutdown sets federal workers on edge</a></div></li>
				
					<li><div class="ap_headline"><a href="/event/apArticle/id/DA967EA83/" class="headline" title="Minn. leaders: Shutdown poses 'evolving' problems">Minn. leaders: Shutdown poses 'evolving' problems</a></div></li>
				
				</ul>
			</div>
		</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
	function voteOnce() {
		var pollQuestion = document.getElementById('poll_question').value;
		
		var cookie_pollID_list = unescape(getCookie('POLL'));
		
		var cookie_pollID_array = new Array();
		var testForComma = cookie_pollID_list.search(/,/);
		if (testForComma != -1) {
			cookie_pollID_array = cookie_pollID_list.split(/,/);
		}
		else {
			cookie_pollID_array[0] = cookie_pollID_list;
		}
		var testForDuplicateID = false;
		for (var i = 0; i < cookie_pollID_array.length; i++) {
			if (unescape(cookie_pollID_array[i]) == pollQuestion) {
				testForDuplicateID = true;
			}
		}
		if (testForDuplicateID == true) {
			document.getElementById('pollSubmit').disabled = true;
			GetResults();
		}
		

	}
	function GetResults(){
		document.getElementById("poll_mod").innerHTML = document.getElementById("poll_results").innerHTML;		
	}

	var req;
	function submitPoll(thisform) {
		var handler = 'submitPollResults';
		var pollQuestion = encodeURIComponent(document.getElementById('poll_question').value);
		var pollChoice = '';
		var url = '';
		for (i = 0; i < thisform.length; i++) {
			if (thisform.elements[i].tagName == "INPUT") {
				if (thisform.elements[i].type == "radio") { //Handle Radio buttons
					if (thisform.elements[i].checked == true) {
						pollChoice = encodeURIComponent(thisform.elements[i].value);
					}
				}
			}
		}
				
		if(pollChoice == '') return false;
		url += "/?event=submitPoll&question=" + pollQuestion + "&choice=" + pollChoice;
		// branch for native XMLHttpRequest object
		if (window.XMLHttpRequest) {
			req = new XMLHttpRequest();
			req.onreadystatechange = eval(handler);
			req.open("GET", url, true);
			req.send(null);
		// branch for IE/Windows ActiveX version
		} else if (window.ActiveXObject) {
			req = new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
			if (req) {
				req.onreadystatechange = eval(handler);
				req.open("GET", url, true);
				req.send();
			}
		}
	}
	function submitPollResults() {
		if (req.readyState == 4) {
			// only if "OK"
			if (req.status == 200) {
				var response = req.responseXML.documentElement;
			  	if(response.getElementsByTagName('success')[0].firstChild.data == 'false') {
					document.getElementById('pollLoginText').style.display = 'block';
			  	}
			  	else {
			  		document.getElementById("poll_results").innerHTML = response.getElementsByTagName('results')[0].firstChild.data;
			  		GetResults();
			  	}
			}
			else {
				alert("An error occured");
			}			
		}
	}
//]]>
</script>


	

<div id='poll_mod' class="widget_box">



	
	 	<h2><a href="/event/polls/">Poll</a></h2>
	
		<div id="pollLoginText" style="display:none">
			<span class="redfont">Please <a href="/event/account:login/">log in</a> to submit a poll.</span><br /><br />
		</div>
	

	<form id="pollform" action="" onsubmit="submitPoll(this);return false;">
  		<p>Should the University of Northâ€ˆDakota change the call sign for its fleet of aircraft?</p>
	<div>
	
  		<input name="choice" id="questionCount1" class="q_news" type="radio" value="Yes" /> <label for="questionCount1">Yes</label><br />
  		
  		<input name="choice" id="questionCount2" class="q_news" type="radio" value="No" /> <label for="questionCount2">No</label><br />
  		
  		<input name="choice" id="questionCount3" class="q_news" type="radio" value="Don%27t%20know" /> <label for="questionCount3">Don't know</label><br />
  		
		<input id="poll_question" name="question" type="hidden" value="Should%20the%20University%20of%20North%E2%80%88Dakota%20change%20the%20call%20sign%20for%20its%20fleet%20of%20aircraft%3F" />
  	
  		<br />
		<input id="pollSubmit" type="submit" value="Vote" class="q_button" /> or <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="GetResults('Should%20the%20University%20of%20North%E2%80%88Dakota%20change%20the%20call%20sign%20for%20its%20fleet%20of%20aircraft%3F')">view poll results &raquo;</a>
	</div>
	</form>

</div>

<div id="poll_results" style="display:none">


	<h2><a href="/event/polls/">Poll</a></h2>

<script type="text/javascript" src="/javascript/JSONScriptRequest.min.js" charset="UTF-8"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8">
//<![CDATA[
    /*global CreatorDomain */
	// The newspaper domain
	CreatorDomain = document.domain;
	CreatorDomain = CreatorDomain.replace( /.*?(?:\.|$)/, '' );
	//CreatorDomain = 'inforum.com';
	
	
	
	
	// The property identifier
	var propertyID = '1';
	var classifiedsPropertyID = propertyID; //'1';
	
	// marketplace variables
	var mkttag = '';
//]]>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/marketplaceV2/mktlist/js/list.min.js" charset="UTF-8" ></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/jobshq.com/js/jobsHQ.min.js" charset="UTF-8"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/carshq.com/js/carsHQ.min.js" charset="UTF-8"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/homeshq.com/js/homesHQ.min.js" charset="UTF-8"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/apartmentshq.com/js/apartmentsHQ.min.js" charset="UTF-8"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/marketplaceV2/mktad/js/mktad.min.js" charset="UTF-8"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/marketplaceV2/mktscroller/js/scroller.min.js" charset="utf-8" ></script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8">
//<![CDATA[
	// The web service call
	var req  = ['http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/marketplaceV2/mktlist/list.php?mktdmn=' + CreatorDomain + '&mkttag=' + mkttag + '&callback=marketplaceListV2_callback',
				'http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/jobshq.com/jobsHQ.php?propertyID=' + classifiedsPropertyID + '&callback=jobs_callback',
				'http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/carshq.com/carsHQ.php?property_ID=' + classifiedsPropertyID + '&CreatorDomain=' + CreatorDomain + '&callback=carsHQ_callback',
				'http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/homeshq.com/homesHQ.php?CreatorDomain=' + CreatorDomain + '&callback=homesHQ_callback',
				'http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/verticals/apartmentshq.com/apartmentsHQ.php?propertyID=' + classifiedsPropertyID + '&callback=apartments_callback',
				'http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/marketplaceV2/mktad/mktad.php?mktdmn=' + CreatorDomain + '&mktadtag=' + mkttag + '&callback=marketplaceDealv2_callback',
				'http://widgets.fccinteractive.com/marketplaceV2/mktscroller/scroller.php?mktdmn=' + CreatorDomain + '&callback=marketplaceScrollerV2_callback'];
	

	for ( var i = 0; i < req.length; i++ )
	{
		// Create a new request object
		Obj = new JSONscriptRequest(req[i]); 
		// Build the dynamic script tag
		Obj.buildScriptTag(); 
		// Add the script tag to the page
		Obj.addScriptTag();
	}
//]]>
</script>



<!-- Simpli.fi retargeting -->
<script async src="http://i.simpli.fi/dpx.js?cid=4004&m=1"></script>

		_qoptions={
			qacct:"p-f1gwFa5-x-0VY"
		};

	</noscript>
